head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CURTIN, JOHN G.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CURTIN, JOHN G.

block.p: CURTIN-John G. Of Englewood, N.J. on July 29, 2000. Beloved husband of Bettie (nee Sarver). Dear brother of Sister Catherine Curtin, D.C., Miss Teresa Curtin and Brother Daniel Curtin, C.F.C.. Donations to Catholic Relief Services 209 W. Fayette St. Baltimore, MD 21201 or SEED or Hospice c/o Englewood Hospital Medical Center 350 Engle St. Englewood, N.J. 07631 would be appreciated. For information contact the Barrett Funeral Home Tenafly, N.J.
